title: ugh riot please.. been almost 2 weeks.. client aint patchin
body: aight so i opened league to patch 7.6 then it loaded and stuff i played a few games everythin is cool, 2 days later i gotta patch again for some reason but this time it scans files and stuff the percentage doesnt change stays at 0 and after a few mins it says "patching failed and we're not sure why. please restart the client to try patching again. (Error code 004)" so i went on the patching problems forums asked a rioter he said its my connection eventhough like 10 other people were havin the same issue told me to go to the connection issues thing and i downloaded the hextech repair tool ran it over and over again still no luck.. note that was more than a week ago.. still not workin.. its fuckin patch 7.7 by now..

replies.body: req lock, reinstalled the game and it worked, thanks anyways

The 004 error is the updated client's way of saying that it's failing to reach the patching server.  League is always online, and a lot of players are going to be patching on a patch day so it's no surprised that a few players get the same issue.   If the guide didn't help, grab the logs that was provided by the HRT and attach it to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team will be able to look into this with you individually and find some options.  Hang tight until then!
